price: 86. Y perdona a mi padre. En verdad, está extraviado.
arabic: وَٱغۡفِرۡ لِأَبِيٓ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wa-igh'fir li-abī innahu kāna mina al-ḍālīna
